text: Ani ha kura'ana asa nahi ki allaha (cya vahayi) sivaya (svatahca) racuna ghetala gela asela. Kimbahuna ha tara (tya granthancya) satyatece samarthana karanara ahe, je yapurvi avatarita kele gele aheta. Ani grantha (avasyaka adesam) ce savistara varnana ahe. Yata mulica sanka nahi ki (ha grantha) samasta visvancya palanakartyatarphe ahe
